summary: When a disgruntled high school senior gets hassled for his lack of ambition, he decides to devote his energy into becoming a serial killer. He starts out small until he meets the girl of his dreams who wants to be his first victim.
cast: Thomas Haden Church|Justin Urich|Lisa Loeb|Rick Overton|George Murdock|Barbara Niven|Stuart Stone|Raymond O'Connor|Esther Scott|Elise Ballard|Corey Feldman|Jennifer Loto|Katherine D'Armond|Chris Weber|Mark Thompson|Dona Hardy|Michael Alaimo|Eric C. Charmelo|Tegan West|Jeff Bowser|Stu Levin|Sparkle|Patti Allison|Ayal Moreno|Trace Slobotkin|James Asmodeo
keywords: serial killer|high school|teacher student relationship|first kiss|fast food
title: Manual del Serial Killer para principiantes
